committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Charles Pinckney National Historic Site in the State of South Carolina, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire lands for the establishment of the Charles Pinckney National Historic Site, South Carolina. Requires the Secretary to report, within three years, to the appropriate congressional committees a general management plan for such site. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Charles Pinckney National Historic Site in the State of South Carolina, and for other purposes.
